### EC {#aee7e5af1b2728a895aae3da9bc625f40}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="IntEqClasses llvm::EdgeBundles::EC">
EC - Each edge bundle is an equivalence class.

The keys are: 2&#42;BB-&gt;getNumber() -&gt; Ingoing bundle. 2&#42;BB-&gt;getNumber()+1 -&gt; Outgoing bundle.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/edgebundles-h/#l00036">36</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/edgebundles-h">EdgeBundles.h</a>.
